numbered_ace_sentences: 2. In most countries, the percentages for 15-24 year olds are higher than the percentages for people who are older than 40.
3. I wonder about people who are between 24 years and 40 years.
4. I ask whether these people had a say.
5. I ask how the graph would differ if the responses of these people were present.
6. I wonder how each country is different.
7. I wonder how the differences between countries affect the responses.
8. A government is an institution of a country.
9. I ask whether the government of a country affects the way people see the world.
10. This comment relates to me and my community.
11. There are many people in my life who are 15-24 year olds.
12. There are many people in my life who are older than 40.
13. I wonder how all of these people would respond.
14. The headline is: Who has hope for the future?
